page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE OF.....
page.content: { Saturday. I get up and go downstairs to watch the television until 10.00 when I go up to have a bath, dress and fetch my library books. I go to the library and change them. Across the road, I visit the baker for rolls and cakes. I go home to hoover and dust for my pocket money then I help dad by washing people's hair and passing him rollers. At 12.00 I make myself a sandwich and I go to my room to read one of my books. After that I play with my sister who is 2 and I spend the rest of the afternoon watching television. I write a story and then it is teatime. Afterwards, I clear up and go out in the garden to play ball until mum calls me in to help put my sister to bed. I kiss her goodnight and go to watch television until it is my turn to go to bed.
